price: mereka membantahmu tentang kebenaran sesudah nyata (bahwa mereka pasti menang), seolah-olah mereka dihalau kepada kematian, sedang mereka melihat (sebab-sebab kematian itu).
arabic: يُجَٰدِلُونَكَ فِي ٱلۡحَقِّ بَعۡدَ مَا تَبَيَّنَ كَأَنَّمَا يُسَاقُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَوۡتِ وَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yujādilūnaka fī al-ḥaqi baʿdamā tabayyana ka-annamā yusāqūna ilā al-mawti wahum yanẓurūna
